text: qul -ayha alrswl- lhwla' aljahdyn llwhy: akhbrwny ean hdha alrizq aldhy khalaqah allah lakum min alhayawan walnbat walkhyrat fhllaltm bed dhlk li'anfusikum whrramtm bedh, qul lhm: allah 'adhin lakum bdhlk, 'am taqulun ealaa allah albatil wtkdhbwn? wa'iinahum layaqulun ealaa allah albatil wykdhbwn
